metadata.title: CVE-2018-1135 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Moodle 3.x. Students who posted on forums andexported the posts to portfolios can download any stored Moodle file bychanging the download URL.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
